tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RiskAnalysisData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  external_data_source VARCHAR,
  ETL_process VARCHAR,
  risk_score INT,
  industry_benchmarks VARCHAR,
);

CREATE TABLE external_data_sources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    external_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE etl_processes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE risk_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_benchmarks TEXT,
    benchmarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE etl_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(50),
  process_type VARCHAR(50),
  process_description TEXT,
  process_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE external_data_source (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name STRING,
    data_type STRING,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE etl_processes (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name STRING,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    status STRING
)

CREATE TABLE risk_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_name STRING,
    risk_score INT,
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE industry_benchmarks (
    benchmark_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    benchmark_name STRING,
    industry_type STRING,
    benchmark_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE benchmarks (
    benchmark_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT,
    benchmark_date DATE,
    benchmark_result FLOAT
)
